mapper.select: {CALL sp_purchase_history_cud( #{operation, mode=IN, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{id, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberId, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{purchaseType, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponId, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{voucherId, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{price, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resultMessage, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{affectedRows, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER} )}
